newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, blue chips firm.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, blue chips firm.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed on Tuesday with leading issues forging ahead.
* Of 17 active stocks, eight were up, seven down and two flat.
* Volume down to 11,487 units and turnover to 7.0 million kuna.
* Biggest gainer insurer Croatia Osiguranje's A-series added 300 kuna or 31.5 percent to 1,250 from last October, on volume of 20 shares.
* Biggest decliner Varazdinska Banka lost 15 kuna or six percent to 235 with 400 shares sold.
* Most actively traded issue drugs firm Pliva added 20 kuna to 460 on volume of 3,463 shares. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
